name: Capsule Defender
description:
A basic, fast paced survival shoot `em up. 3 hearts, limited ammo and infinite enemies. How long will you last?

Use WASD to move, arrow keys to shoot.

To heal pickup Healing Crystals and to replenish ammo pickup ammo barrels.

Comment what your time was, my personal best is 82 seconds.

Made in 3 hours for the Friday Night Game Jam.
